title: So a match got remade
body: So riot wouldnt connect me to the server for whatever reason so i try 4 times and finally reconnect and my team starts the remake vote. This remake vote is 2 yes 3 no but some how the game still gets remade and i got leaver and lost lp. Please help or explain. Would really like my lp back as i am almost out of bronze and that just set me back a game that i should not have been set back.

replies.body: I haven't heard of any issues with voting for remake, but it's possible that your connection issue may not have been in sync with the votes properly.  I couldn't say for sure, but game stats are not something that can be changed.  The best thing you can do is to resolve whatever is causing you to have interruptions.  I'd be happy to help with that, just let me know what's going on with more details.  Let me know!
i have two friends who were in the game with me and the same votes were also on their screen as well as everyone else who was in that game

Unfortunately, I have no method of verifying the exact votes.  In the initial post you said it was 2 yes and 3 no.  Per the[ /remake](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686) guide, in a 4v5 it only requires two players to vote yes.  Two votes for Yes will pass the vote.  Hope that helps clear some things up.
